name: Poly Swipe
description:
This is the first alpha test of my very first game so please don't be too harsh in your judgment. You play as a tiny polygon trying to avoid lasers and other obstacles. I really wanted to go for a more arcade style game with it only being one screen/instance. 

Point in a direction with w,a,s,d or arrow keys and press space to move.

Please post any and all suggestions and complaints in the comments I want to improve.
